item.title: Expressing Gratitude Using Python and R
item.description: Ever wanted to express some gratitude to the people you went to school with for the past four years because youâ€™re graduating in 13 days and started writing on R (because Microsoft Word is overrated) but then learned how to use Python while having a project due in 5 days and you need to show your professor how to use Python and R together? Because same. So I took all my problems and combined them into one.
